post.author: Admin
post.title: Parent Mixer and Parent Preview Night
post.description:
Hi Parents!
Parent Mixer The day is here! Our parent mixer is Thursday, August 13, at The 3 Spot f
post.content:
Hi Parents!

Parent Mixer

The day is here! Our parent mixer is Thursday, August 13, at The 3 Spot from 6-9 pm! Come join us! We will have sportswear available! This is a great opportunity to get to know members of our band family and just kick back and relax! Just drop your Bando off at rehearsal and join us! I look forward to seeing you there!

Parent Preview Night

Parent Preview Night is THIS Sunday, August 16, at 7 PM. We will have membership, sportswear and button sales available for purchase! Be sure to check Mr. Vitale's website (www.northroyaltonhighschoolband.com) for more information. Please note - Students will need to wear the purple band polo and khakis with a black belt, black socks and band shoes to this event.

We look forward to seeing you at these events!

Holly Michalke
Band Booster President
